case.state: Wow... you had the guts to show up with your dick out already , but it ain't much to look at to begin with. How sad.
I can't believe you felt the need to show everyone your tiny little pencil dick before the game even started, ~human~. How sad.
Listen, ~player~, I appreciate the enthusiasm, but... You kinda forgot most of your clothes.
Well well. Showin' up without a shirt, ~player~? How bold of you.
I'm here to win -- for Team Magma!
If you suffer from chills, you should join Team Magma!
I've come all this way for one reason... to win in the name of Team Magma!
Too much water? Join Team Magma, and we'll fix that!
Team Magma appears where anything rare or valuable can be found!

You are challenged by
Team Magma Grunt!
I'm here to win, even if it's four-on-one!
We're Team Magma...
... and we're here to show you ...
... the power of the land over water ...
... and ... wait a minute, what are we doing?
~Human~, did you bring me here as a joke? Do you think so little of me? Am I just here for your amusement? This is borderline insulting.
What are we, some kinda... April fools joke?
"Suction Cup Man"? What, are you part of Team Suction Cup? Or are you just some independent weirdo?
Lady... please control your child.
The hell kind of internet meme mess did I stumble into?
Wait a minute... 'May'... that name rings a bell.
I feel like this girl is way too eager to get started...
Listen, girlie? You're way too eager to get started with this...
... Is that a car? A literal car? ~Human~, did you bring me here as a joke? Do you think so little of me? Am I just here for your amusement? This is insulting.
This is the weirdest feeling, but... I think God left Default-chan unfinished.
Well well. Came back for more, ~human~? I should've figured you'd demand a rematch after that last one.
Well well. You really came back for more, ~human~? Good to know you didn't chicken out after that last game, heh heh.
Finally, a chance to get revenge. Just 'cause you won the last game doesn't mean it'll go the same way this time, ~human~!
The versus seeker worked! Time for payback after that last game, ~human~!
Wait, Shelly? Shelly from... Team Aqua?! I won't lose to you! ... Wait, you aren't her. Nevermind.
What am I doing in a place like this? I was invited here! ...or sent here, rather. My name is--
What? Of course I'm meant to be here! My name should be on the list, it's--
Wait a second, I d-don't think I signed up to play against the living dead!
W-wait, I don't think I signed up to play against the living dead!
This case sets a marker if the player isn't male + gay, or isn't female + straight. Makes it easier than having to do an OR comparison all the time.
Oh, we're already starting? Okay, I'll... I'll swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
What? Of course I'm meant to be here! My name should be on the list, it's--
I don't need to swap any.
Can I keep what I have? Thanks.
I'll stick to what I have!
I don't need to swap any!
I'll stick with what I have!
I'll be fine with what I have!
You kiddin'? With a hand like this, I'll keep what I have!
Alright, I'll swap ~cards.text~ this round.
I'll swap ~cards.text~. That should be fine, right?
Show me... ~cards.text~ new ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Show me ~cards.text~ new ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~!
I'll swap ~cards.text~!
I'll swap ~cards.text~. That's enough, right?
(Oh thank Arceus, a good hand.)
Aha, a lucky break at last!
Aww yeah, a lucky break at last!
Even I know when to keep a hand this good! Heh heh...
With a hand like this, I can't possibly lose!
I think this is a good hand?
What are you looking at me for?
I... I think I'm okay!
I should be okay!
I guess this is the part where Team Magma shines!
Team Magma members always know how to make a good comeback!
This'll be fine.
Oh this'll go great!
Think you can take me?
Heh heh, looks like Team Magma wins this round.
Don't forget me!
You chumps don't stand a chance!
This is... okay, right? Yeah, I think my cards are OK.

state.text: I hope this is good enough!

case.state: These cards are good enough for Team Magma!
Is this hand... oh no, no it's not!
I think I misread one of my cards... this should still do, though.
Uh, you guys will go easy on me, right? R-right?
Well... Uh... Any chance I could get you guys to be a Substitute for me? No?
Hey guys, Is a Team Aqua grunt dealin' me these cards? ... Yeah, that wasn't funny, I know.

state.text: Oh, this is just... can't I get some good cards once in a while?

case.state: Oh, I'm bad at this.
Oh, for the love of...
Oh, great. Here we go again.
Well, this is a terrible start.
Any chance I could get a do-over? I think I swapped the wrong card...
Not my best...
Ah crap, I missed up already.
Wait... Ah... I read some of my cards wrong... I should've swapped after all...
Wait, how did I end up with... I should've swapped after all.
Much like the S. S. Cactus, my pride as a Team Magma member is rapidly sinkin'...
Oh no...
Oh no... no no no no-
Looks like this is the end...
Well, I guess this is how it ends.
Well, magi-crap.
Well, that's just awful.
If I could, I'd have my Numel scorch these cards...
These cards are... awful.
These cards are just bad, like, I'd throw 'em in Mt Pyre if I could.
Magma Grunt thought about using Run, but couldn't due to her pride!

{small}W-w-wait a minute! That's... the Sinnoh Champion! Oh crap!{!reset}
Uh, nice weather we're havin', right?

{small}W-w-wait a dang second! That's... the Sinnoh Champion! Oh crap!{!reset}
Uh, nice ~background.time~ we're havin', right?
Are you kiddin'? Only the greatest, meanest, burning-est Pokémon are fit to be my favorite -- and that's my Numel!
Aww hell yeah, a real question! Only the greatest, meaning, burning-est Pokémon in Hoenn -- and that's my Numel!
Wait, I'm confused. Isn't this meant to be another universe? Or is it not? Oof, my head hurts just thinkin' about it.
Travel to another universe? Isn't that how we all got here? Or was it not? Oof, my head hurts just thinkin' about it for some reason...
You know, one of the other grunts said he's worried that they're gonna find out that there's a football Pokémon one day, meanin' people have been doin' a lot of Pokémon kickin'...
Do you guys know what we're doin' here? It feels like we're all just here to get naked for ~human~...
I was the only sis' of three brothers. They made a mess of things all the time.
Wait, you're... Nevermind. (I recognise her now! She's a strong trainer and a contest trainer!)

state.text: You know Erufuda, you're makin' me want to grab some fast food after this.

case.state: Talkin' to animals? I mean, if I could talk to my Pokémon, that'd really help me know how to train 'em...
Wait, isn't havin' two more cards only an advantage? That's hardly fair!
So how come the magic jar gets to draw more cards? I never got into Magic so I dont get what it does.
Ahaha. It's Sans Undertale himself. I am literally beside myself with laughter. I cannot contain myself. Ahahaha.

state.text: You can do this... you can do this! You're part of Team Magma! This'll be fine!
Let's see, if I just... no, I can't fight my way out... I didn't even bring my numel with me, so that plan's out...
Maybe if I pretend to be sick? No, I'm bad at that, Courtney saw right through me when I tried to skip trash duty...

case.state: Can't let my guard down, even at the beach...
Can't let somethin' sneak up behind me from the water... I've got my eye on you, ocean.
Gah, I'm so friggin' hot. Why did it have to be the beach... this hoodie is so stuffy...
Hey, at least I'm dressed properly for some time at the beach!
On the good side of things, I'm properly dressed down for the beach now!
I should've prepared myself mentally for this... I've never done anythin' this perverted {small}with others around{!reset}. But I'll keep playing, f-for Team Magma!
Well well, looks like things are gettin' head-to-head now, ~opp~. You in it to win it?
I think I'm gettin' the hang of this! Do you guys do this together often?
I think I'm startin' to like you chumps! Do you hang out like this all the time?
This game ain't so bad now that I'm used to it. Do you all hang out like this often?
Well, at least this is slightly less humiliating than the time that young trainer kicked my ass...
(Man, I could really go for a snack right now.)
At least this isn't as bad as my attempt at a super contest...
Team Magma Grunt is out of usable clothing!
Team Magma Grunt is out of usable items!
Team Magma Grunt is out of ideas!
I-if you'd like to see more girls with scorching hot bodies, join Team Magma! (No, that was awful!)
Any of you chumps down for a game of Pokémonopoly after this? I promise, I know the rules this time.
Any of you twerps down for a game of Pokémonopoly after this? I swear I won't let anyone cheat this time....
Hmm, better put my phone on silent. Don't want anyone interruptin'.
Hmm... Whatever happened to that guy, Buddy- no, Brodie ? Never heard from him again...
Hmm... Tabitha's been spammin' the group chat with his stupid meme again. What a dork.
Hey, what's the WI-fi password for this place? C'mon, tell me.
What? Of course it was a choice! You think I got forced into joinin' the coolest team there is?
Huh? Of course it was my own choice! What, you think I got forced into joinin' the best team in Hoenn? C'mon!
I suppose this will even things out a bit.
Darn, I didn't keep my lead.
Ah, darn, it's me now? I was doing so well.
I lost? Oh, uh, fine.
Of course I... I cut you guys some more slack! Yeah, didn't want to make this too easy for myself.
I guess my winning streak is at an end. For Team Magma...
And I was doing so well!
I figured I should cut you guys some slack, so, you're welcome. (I think they bought it!)
Hm? Oh, it's me, right.
Yep, of course it's me. No problem.
Right, let's get down to it.
Oh, I lost again? Alright, guess I'll pick somethin'.
It's my turn? Dang, now I have to give that up...
Oh, my turn? Uh, of course! No worries!
Any chance I could change your mind? No?
Aha! You see, I've got you right where I want you! This is all a clever ruse by one of Team Magma's... uh... finest members!
Uh, c-can somebody else do it this round? Please? I'll make it up to you!
This isn't about Team Magma any more -- you guys are bullying me!
I knew that wouldn't work. Guess I'll need to say goodbye to my socks then.
Another loss? Not a good start, I'll admit...
My turn again?
My pride as a Team Magma grunt is vanishing down to nothing...
Alright, I won a round! ... eh? Oh come on!
Team Magma will have its revenge! ... Right after this round.
Really, me again? Can't I catch a break, go to a Pokémon Center or something?
I'll just start with my gloves... (Don't make eye contact with Cynthia! She'll see your fear!)
I don't have to start big, right? I'll just slip off my gloves, then.
I have a brilliant and original plan - taking off my gloves first!
Like a cunning Vulpix, I'll take off my gloves first!
Like a cunning Nickit, I'll take off my gloves first!
Guess the next step is to get rid of my shoes. They just slip right off!
I guess the next thing is to slip off my shoes. Nothin' to it, they don't even have laces.
Before you ask, no, this isn't official Team Magma underwear. I just like to dress to match, okay?
Before you even ask, no, these aren't part of the uniform. I just like to dress to match, okay?
Before you even ask, no, these aren't part of the uniform. I just like the colors, alright?
My official Team Magma hoodie... it's a shame, but I can survive without it!
The official hoodie of a Team Magma member... they made a lot of them in my size. I'll be fine without it.
I love proudly wearing the hoodie of Team Magma ... but not so much when we worked inside Mt. Chimney. That was a scorcher.
When I was a kid, my socks got torn up by a wild Poochyena. Got made fun of for it at school.
Gotta be careful going through the tall grass - a lotta wild Pokémon like to nip at your legs, and that means your socks get scuffed.
Down go my Team Magma shorts... the most comfortable part of the kit!
The shorts are the most comfortable part of my kit... ah well.
These shorts are so comfy, breezy, easy to wear... I could go on, but I won't.

Well, if I have to... I'll get rid of my shirt. It's the only thing I can do.
Sigh.

I guess there's nothin' else for it... the shirt has to go.
Sigh.
I guess if I've got nothin' else left, there's nothin' for it...
I haven't got any other choice in clothin', so I may as well...
So, there... I'm playing fairly, see? Nothing to worry about! (I think she bought it!)
Who knows? Maybe I can work on my tan a little more while we're here.
Maybe I'll sneak in a little more topless bathing while I'm here. What do you think, ~player~?
Maybe I can do some topless sunbathing while I'm here. What do you think, ~player~? Would you be a total pervert if I did that?
Maybe I'll work on my tan while we're here. You wouldn't be a total pervert about it, right ~player~?
What, you think I'm worried about goin' barefoot outdoors? I've still got my socks on, c'mon!
(I can't even try to look composed with ~leech~ looking at me! I'll just turn away for now!)
~Leech~ used Leer. Magma Grunt's Defense fell!
This is absolutely freakin' ridiculous. How the hell are you doing this? Did I miss a trick or somethin'?
I'm... tryin' something a little different down there. Don't judge me! In fact, just look away!
I was tryin' a little bit of style down there... Don't stare at it! In fact, just look away!
I wasn't actually expectin' to have to show off to anyone... I'm tryin' something new! Don't judge me!
I've heard that 'joke' so many times when guys try to pick me up. Jeez.
I've heard that lame excuse of a joke so many times from guys. Ugh.
Guys always try to approach me with the same line, "Oh durr do your undies match your hood?" What Taillow brains...
There, happy? You got to see my sports bra. Congratulations on your achievement.
Fine! You got to see my sports bra, happy? What an achievement, bravo!
You haven't seen anythin' yet. I'm gonna win this stupid game!
Don't lose those! The pouch has my wallet in it -- and I counted my spare change before the game!
Put those somewhere safe! The pouch has my wallet in it - and I counted my Pokédollars before I came here!
So... Please take care of my hoodie, we're only given one. If I lose it, I'll have to pay for a replacement.
Am I even recognizable without my hoodie? Sometimes I take it off and it feels like I go totally incognito...
I was thinkin' it felt weird being in my socks, but being barefoot feels weirder.
I don't like how this is goin'. Hope none of you are into toes or anythin', because I don't like creeps like that.
It's traditionally rude to keep your outdoor shoes on when inside, anyway.
Keepin' your socks on indoors is polite, right? You wouldn't force me to be a rude guest by goin' barefoot, would you?
It'll be your turn, next! Don't underestimate me!
See? I'm a-OK!
You think a tough grunt like me is gonna be afraid just cause she's lost her gloves?
Let's rock and Roggenrolla.

Actually looking at you, I don't think you're nervous, are you ~human~? You're... enjoying this.

Looks like ~human~ lost again! Oh, sorry if I sounded excited... but I am, a little bit...

case.state: Oh, I'll be nice to ya alright, I'll... I'll be nice, don't worry. I'm serious.
